description: a(n)=Sum{|d(i)-d(i-1)|: i=1,...,m}, where Sum{d(i)*4^i: i=0,1,...,m} is the base 4 representation of n.
maple: A037836 := proc(n)    local dgs ;    dgs := convert(n,base,4);    add( abs(op(i,dgs)-op(i-1,dgs)),i=2..nops(dgs)) ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 16 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
